content.content: 1. February 28, 1999 is prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection 363 (31) of the Act. O. Reg. 53/99, s. 1. Graduated Tax Rate By-law Deadline
content.raw_html:
1. February 28, 1999 is prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 1 of subsection 363 (31) of the Act. O. Reg. 53/99, s. 1.

Graduated Tax Rate By-law Deadline

content.content: 2. (1) The time for passing a by-law under subsection 368.2 (1) of the Act for 1998 is extended to February 28, 1999. O. Reg. 53/99, s. 2. (2) Despite subsection (1), for the purposes of The Corporation of the County of Brant the time for passing a by-law under subsection 368.2 (1) of the Act for 1998 is extended to October 30, 1999. O. Reg. 495/99, s. 1. Tax Ratio Establishment By-law Deadline
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The time for passing a by-law under subsection 368.2 (1) of the Act for 1998 is extended to February 28, 1999. O. Reg. 53/99, s. 2.

(2) Despite subsection (1), for the purposes of The Corporation of the County of Brant the time for passing a by-law under subsection 368.2 (1) of the Act for 1998 is extended to October 30, 1999. O. Reg. 495/99, s. 1.
